name: Aliens & Cows
description:
You play as a friendly alien protagonist trying to save the peaceful cows from the not so friendly aliens coming from who knows where to do who knows what with them.

- Use the WASD to move and space bar to jump.
-Use the mouse to aim and left-click to shoot.
-Shoot the cows while they're being beamed up to save them from the alien autopsy (before they reach the flying saucer).
-Try not lose sight of the flying saucer.

Enjoy!
(Updates will happen post-game jam with an actual Main Menu, some wanted/necessary mechanics, and more.)
